ygData.subject: Re: Source for Combine Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, it s called Dvinn. His Dragoon Dirk is better than any Combine weapon except a Two Handed Sword. You can also sometimes find the dirks for sale. My friend
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, it's called Dvinn. His Dragoon Dirk is better than any Combine weapon
except a Two Handed Sword. You can also sometimes find the dirks for sale.
My friend bought one for 40plat last night...

Lulen

----- Original Message -----
From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 10:22
Subject: [eqbards] Source for Combine Weapons


> From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
>
> I've found the gypsy camp in the Oasis of Marr where I can buy Combine
> weapons. Is there such a source anywhere in Faydwer?
>
> Thrush
